attributes.action: Make prescriptions free for chronic asthmatics
attributes.additional_details: Written twice to local MPS with the same answer. No as asthma is not classed as life threatening
attributes.background: I have written to MPS many times and had the same answer ..it will not happen. My son has 2 inhalers every month since he was 2. How can they say asthma is not life threatening. Have they seen an asthmatic have an attack. All chronic asthmatics should have free prescription the same as diabetics
